page.title: 04HOUSES IN WANSFORD
page.content: There are many kinds of houses in Wansford. The most common houses are semi_detached and terraced cottages. In addition there are some detached houses. The largest house is THE HAYCOCK HOTEL. Most of the big houses have got big gardens. Some have front gardens. Some have back gardens. All of the gardens are well looked after. Most of the houses are made of stone. Some at the north end of the village are made of new stone and all the old houses roofs are made of slates. They often have old latticed windows although some of them have just had new windows put in. Most houses were made in the seventeenth century and some of the houses are 500 years old but are still standing.
